user_bz.googleLogin(pg, user_info)[source]¶
google 登录信息存到 db 中
{
“id”: “112340346785758313259”, “email”: “vermiliondun@gmail.com”, “verified_email”: true, “name”: “朱一凡”, “given_name”: “一凡”, “family_name”: “朱”, “link”: “https://plus.google.com/112340346785758313259”, “picture”: “https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-E4rb72RaQHE/AAAAAAAAAAI/AAAAAAAAJzQ/p-tx9D78Mik/photo.jpg”, “gender”: “male”, “locale”: “zh-CN”

user_bz.login(user_name, password, pg)[source]¶

登录模块,如果不存在这个用户名,则注册 数据模型:

CREATE TABLE user_info (

user_type text, – google or other out_id text, – google id or other email text, user_name text, link text, picture text, gender text, – mail? locale text, –zh-CN password text, original_json text –用来存放原始返回的 json 字段,避免有内容没存到

– 继承 from table base: user_id integer ) INHERITS (base)

twitter 登录信息存到 db 中
